title: Twitter co-founder apologizes for growing company ‘too quickly’
description: Co-founder Jack Dorsey says he has "responsibility for why everyone is in this situation"

title: They traded Twitter for Mastodon Social. Now what?
description: People are swapping Twitter for a tech-savvy replacement called Mastodon Social. But when they get there, many are underwhelmed and craving another alternative.

title: With Musk at the helm, tweeting the boss may actually change Twitter
description: Elon Musk turned his hobby into a career when he purchased Twitter a week ago. Owners of Tesla and SpaceX, Musk has always been extremely engaged online.

title: Dallas Fuel beat San Francisco Shock 4-3 in Overwatch League Grand Final
description: The Dallas Fuel victory over the San Francisco Shock marks the team's first Grand Finals victory. A new tank hero, Ramattra, was also announced at the event.
